name: PAT_ENC_ED_AREA
description: The PAT_ENC_ED_AREA table contains a list of the Care Areas a patient was in during their stay in the ED.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: This is a numeric representation of the date of this patient encounter.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date of the encounter associated with these care areas. Care areas typically represent a group of beds, a group of patients, or a unit within the hospital or organization.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the care area list. Care areas typically represent a group of beds, a group of patients, or a unit within the hospital or organization.

columns.name: ED_CARE_AREA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient's care area during their stay in the Emergency Department. Care areas typically represent a group of beds, a group of patients, or a unit within the hospital or organization.

columns.name: ED_AREA_TIME
columns.description: The instant that the patient was placed into this care area. Care areas typically represent a group of beds, a group of patients, or a unit within the hospital or organization.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
